headline: GE Forecast Upgrade Tests Valuation As Power And Data Center Orders Grow
summary: GE (NYSE:GE) significantly raised its annual revenue forecast, citing strong demand in its power and electrification segments. The company reported a surge in new orders, supported by increased investment in data centers. Management highlighted robust demand trends across key electrification and power markets as a driver of the updated outlook. For you as an investor, the key detail is where this momentum is coming from. GE is leaning on its power and electrification businesses, which sit...

headline: US Ski Resorts Turn to Drones to Make It Snow Amid Dire Drought
summary: When weather conditions are just right, a Winter Park contractor fires up the machine, burning a fine dust of silver iodide into the sky — a process known as cloud seeding.  The silver iodide becomes the nuclei for water droplets, like iron filings to a magnet.  Doug Laraby, who has helped run Winter Park for nearly four decades, says the resort leaned heavily on its cloud seeding equipment over the Christmas holiday, sprinkling the skies as fresh powder fell days before the critical New Years weekend.

headline: Jim Cramer GE Vernova Has “Visibility on the Earnings to the 2030s”
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shared takes on, along with navigating market shortages.
